Summary: 2 disc shaped objects met high in ne sky circled & disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a beautiful cloudless day. I was in the garage looking out toward the Northeast (North of Auburn) just thinking that this is quite a great day when movement in the sky caught my attention. I saw an object flying due East and level. There was no sound and I saw neither props nor jet engines on it. It reflected the sun off its surface and appeared roundish or disc shaped. It then started flying in a tight circle-I've never seen a plane that was capable of doing such a thing. Then, from the North, it was joined by a second like object. The two circled each other for about a minute and then just disappeared from sight in the same instant still circling each other. I think they were discs as opposed to round because they would appear much thinner when making banking turns in the circle thus narrowing their reflective surface facing the sun.
